subtitle: Serve as a light meal or starter with some salad and chopped walnuts.

method.text: Combine the cheeses together and beat to a creamy consistency. Put into a piping bag with a large plain nozzle.
Carefully remove the stalk and core from the pears using an apple corer. Sprinkle in the lemon juice. Pipe or pack the cheese mixture into the pear cavity. Chill well.
Put all the dressing ingredients into a screw-top jar and shake well. Cut each pear into even slices and arrange on serving plates. Serve with the dressing.

title: Pears stuffed with blue cheese
